content: The Marines closing in snap Luffy back to attention, and he continues to run, thanking Rayleigh one more time. Rayleigh, remembering their training together, tells Luffy to go straight for the top. He then gets in the Marines' way and draws a line in the ground, warning them not to cross it. Meanwhile, Luffy, Sanji, and Zoro continue to flee but find themselves surrounded by more Marines. However, negative ghosts suddenly appear and stop them, revealing Perona to the trio. She chides Zoro when he asks why she is still there, revealing that she was the one who brought him to Sabaody. She then warns the three that Marine ships are near the island.
